comments.creator: hskupin@gmail.com
comments.author: hskupin@gmail.com
comments.text: The broken behavior for this API actually blocks my work on bug 1637640. If there is a frameset and `DOM.describeNode()` is called on the frame element, CDP returns the frame's id and not the one from the parent.
comments.raw_text: The broken behavior for this API actually blocks my work on bug 1637640. If there is a frameset and `DOM.describeNode()` is called on the frame element, CDP returns the frame's id and not the one from the parent.
